name: Project Shield
description: Welcome to a new simulator called Project Shield, here you will enter a simulation where you must fend for your life. It is you against your endurance, your friends, and your enemies. Enjoy a fast paced simulation in which you will be protecting yourself with nothing more than the provided shield.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later or Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater. Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
